items.sentence: Tom stabbed Mary repeatedly with his knife.
The only place Tom has ever gone is Boston.

I\'d like to live in a better neighborhood.
I\'ll ask around and see what people think.

Milder temperatures are expected next week.

Tom doesn\'t often get a chance to do that.

Let\'s roll up our sleeves and get to work.

I\'ll do everything you\'ve asked me to do.
